summary: This is an email from the Bureau of Prisons (BOP) system regarding a new drive for Maxwell, likely referring to Ghislaine Maxwell. The email appears to be a forwarded or embedded message about a storage drive related to Maxwell's case.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The email subject and content reference a 'new drive for Maxwell,' indicating she is the subject of the communication, likely Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Email about new drive for Maxwell
events.description: An email is sent regarding a new drive (likely a storage drive) for Maxwell, possibly related to evidence or case materials.

keyFacts: The email is dated December 4, 2020, and originates from a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) government email system.
The subject references a 'new drive for Maxwell,' likely indicating the creation or transfer of a storage drive containing case-related materials for Ghislaine Maxwell.
The email appears to be a forwarded or embedded message, suggesting it is part of internal government correspondence regarding Maxwell's case.
